text: Erik Pochanski (; born 5 April 1992) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Dobrudzha Dobrich. == Career == ===Early career=== Pochanski started his career in Chavdar Etropole in 2010 and moved to Montana in 2013. In June 2015 Pochanski signed a pre-contract with Dunav Ruse, but latеly the same month moved to Ludogorets Razgrad II.Почански избяга от „Дунав“ след офертата от „Лудогорец“ In the beginning of 2016 he moved to another B Group team Lokomotiv GO.Ерик Почански направи първа тренировка с „Локомотив” === Beroe === On 10 June 2016 Pochanski moved to Beroe Stara Zagora.Ерик Почански подписа с Берое, Светослав Петров влиза в щаба He made his debut for the team on 31 June 2016 in a match for Europa League First qualifying round against FK Radnik Bijeljina.Берое стартира с реми в Европа след нулево равенство с Радник On 7 July he scored both goals for a 2:0 win which qualified Beroe to a further round.Ерик Почански поднесе на тепсия класирането на Берое On 18 July 2017, Pochanski's contract was terminated by mutual consent. === Etar === On 20 July 2017, Pochanski signed with Etar Veliko Tarnovo. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !Colspan="3"|Club performance!!Colspan="2"|League!!Colspan="2"|Cup!!Colspan="2"|Continental!!Colspan="2"|Other!!Colspan="3"|Total |- !Club!!League!!Season!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- !Colspan="3"|Bulgaria!!Colspan="2"|LeagueIncludes play-off matches, where applicable.!!Colspan="2"|Bulgarian Cup!!Colspan="2"|Europe!!Colspan="2"|OtherIncludes Bulgarian Supercup matches.!!Colspan="2"|Total |- | rowspan=4|Chavdar Etropole |2010–11 | rowspan=3| B Group |16||1||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||16||1 |- |2011–12 |13||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||13||1 |- |2012–13 |24||3||2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||26||3 |- !
